=== libgksu ===

* add `pkg-config --libs x11` to test_gksuui_LDFLAGS in libgksuui/Makefile.am
* add `pkg-config --libs gtk+-2.0` to test_gksu_LDFLAGS in libgksu/Makefile.am

=== Patch ===
<pre>
--- tarballs/libgksu-2.0.12/libgksuui/Makefile.am	2008-05-09 11:39:54.000000000 -0600
+++ libgksu-2.0.13~pre1/libgksuui/Makefile.am	2010-07-21 17:40:58.000000000 -0600
@@ -12,4 +12,4 @@
 noinst_PROGRAMS = test-gksuui
 test_gksuui_SOURCES = test-gksuui.c
 test_gksuui_LDADD = libgksuui1.0.la
-test_gksuui_LDFLAGS = `pkg-config --libs glib-2.0`
+test_gksuui_LDFLAGS = `pkg-config --libs glib-2.0` `pkg-config --libs x11`
--- tarballs/libgksu-2.0.12/libgksu/Makefile.am	2009-08-16 15:20:16.000000000 -0600
+++ libgksu-2.0.13~pre1/libgksu/Makefile.am	2010-07-21 17:42:22.000000000 -0600
